name: part_010
file: tmp_【新衣装3Dお披露目】AZKi 6th Anniversary Live ＂百花繚乱＂【#AZKi新衣装3Dライブ】 [bHXB9qI2olE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: AZKi delivers an MC message to her fans, the 'Pioneers', expressing her gratitude and future aspirations on her 6th anniversary.
Transition to the final song performance with audience applause and a dark stage.
Performance of the song 'Togetsukyo ~Kimi Omou~' by Mai Kuraki.

subtitles.original: 本当に本当に、
subtitles.english: Truly, truly,

subtitles.original: 開拓者のみんなのパワーをめちゃくちゃいただいた、
subtitles.english: I received so much power from all the Pioneers,

subtitles.original: 本当そんな年だったなって思います。
subtitles.english: I think it was really that kind of year.

subtitles.original: これからもたくさんみんなのことを、えー、楽し、
subtitles.english: From now on, I'll keep doing my best...

subtitles.original: みんなに楽しんでもらえるような配信だったり、歌だったりを頑張っていきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: ...to bring you streams and songs that you can all enjoy.

subtitles.original: みんなが、えっと、元気に、元気に、
subtitles.english: I want to be someone who can give everyone energy,

subtitles.original: そして、ま、癒やし、癒やしを与えられる存在になりたいなって今後もそうなりたいなと思っていますので
subtitles.english: and, well, become a presence that provides healing to you all.

subtitles.original: これからも応援よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: So please continue to support me!

subtitles.original: はい。それでは、本当に本当に今日最後の曲です。
subtitles.english: Alright. Now, this is truly the last song for today.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: 渡月橋 ～君 想ふ～
subtitles.english: Togetsukyo ~Kimi Omou~

subtitles.original: 寄り添う二人に 君がオーバーラップ
subtitles.english: As the two of us drew close, you overlapped

subtitles.original: 色なき風に 思い馳せて
subtitles.english: In the colorless wind, my thoughts drift to you

subtitles.original: 触れた手の温もり 今も
subtitles.english: The warmth of your hand when we touched, even now...

subtitles.original: Stop 時間を止めて
subtitles.english: Stop, let time stand still

subtitles.original: そう いつの日だって
subtitles.english: Yes, no matter the day

subtitles.original: 君の言葉 忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget your words

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない 切なくて もどかしい
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to, it's painful and frustrating

subtitles.original: から紅に染まる渡月橋 導かれる日願って
subtitles.english: The Togetsu Bridge stained in deep crimson, I pray for the day I'm led there

subtitles.original: 川の流れに祈りを込めて
subtitles.english: Putting my prayers into the river's flow

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you, I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you, I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: いつも こころ 君のそば
subtitles.english: Always, my heart is by your side

subtitles.original: 古の景色 変わりなく
subtitles.english: The ancient scenery remains unchanged

subtitles.original: 今 この瞳に映し出す
subtitles.english: Reflected in my eyes right now

subtitles.original: 彩りゆく季節 越えて
subtitles.english: Crossing through the seasons as they color

subtitles.original: Stock 覚えてますか?
subtitles.english: Stock, do you remember?

subtitles.original: ねぇ いつになったら
subtitles.english: Hey, when will it be...

subtitles.original: また巡り会えるのかな
subtitles.english: ...that we can meet again?

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない この胸を焦がすの
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to, it scorches my heart

subtitles.original: から紅に水くくるとは 君との想いつなげて
subtitles.english: The deep crimson waters, connecting my thoughts of you

subtitles.original: 川の流れに祈りを込めて
subtitles.english: Putting my prayers into the river's flow

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you, I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you, I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: いつも 君を 探してる
subtitles.english: I'm always searching for you

subtitles.original: 君となら不安さえ どんな時も消えていくよ
subtitles.english: With you, even my anxiety disappears anytime

subtitles.original: いつになったら優しく抱きしめられるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder when I'll be able to be held gently

subtitles.original: から紅の紅葉たちさえ 熱い思いを告げては
subtitles.english: Even the deep crimson autumn leaves, telling of hot passion

subtitles.original: ゆらり揺れて歌っています
subtitles.english: Swaying gently as they sing

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you, I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you, I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: いつも いつも 君想ふ
subtitles.english: Always, always, thinking of you
